牡.definition: (of a bird, animal or plant) male; key; hills

牡丹亭.definition: The Peony Pavilion (1598), play by Tang Xianzu 湯顯祖|汤显祖[Tang1 Xian3 zu3]

牡丹區.definition: Mudan District of Heze City 菏澤市|菏泽市[He2 ze2 Shi4], Shandong

牡丹卡.definition: Peony Card (credit card issued by Industrial and Commercial Bank of China)

牡丹江市.definition: Mudanjiang, prefecture-level city in Heilongjiang Province 黑龍江省|黑龙江省[Hei1long2jiang1 Sheng3]

牡丹皮.definition: root bark of the peony tree (used in TCM)

牡丹鄉.definition: Mutan township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan

牡丹雖好，全仗綠葉扶.pinyin: mu3 dan5 sui1 hao3 , quan2 zhang4 lu:4 ye4 fu2
牡丹雖好，全仗綠葉扶.definition: Although the peony is beautiful, it depends entirely on help from the green leaves (idiom). However brilliant you may be, you can't do anything without support from others.

牡丹雖好，全仗綠葉扶持.pinyin: mu3 dan5 sui1 hao3 , quan2 zhang4 lu:4 ye4 fu2 chi2
牡丹雖好，全仗綠葉扶持.definition: Although the peony is beautiful, it depends entirely on help from the green leaves (idiom). However brilliant you may be, you can't do anything without support from others.

牡丹雖好，全憑綠葉扶持.pinyin: mu3 dan5 sui1 hao3 , quan2 ping2 lu:4 ye4 fu2 chi2
牡丹雖好，全憑綠葉扶持.definition: Although the peony is beautiful, it depends entirely on help from the green leaves (idiom). However brilliant you may be, you can't do anything without support from others.

牡丹雖好，終須綠葉扶持.pinyin: mu3 dan5 sui1 hao3 , zhong1 xu1 lu:4 ye4 fu2 chi2
牡丹雖好，終須綠葉扶持.definition: Although the peony is beautiful, it depends entirely on help from the green leaves (idiom). However brilliant you may be, you can't do anything without support from others.

牡羊座.definition: Aries (constellation and sign of the zodiac); used erroneously for 白羊座
